item.title: Get started
item.description: R2 get started guideCloudflare R2 Storage allows developers to store large amounts of unstructured data without the costly egress bandwidth fees associated with typical cloud storage services. ​â€‹ Purchase R2 Before you create your first bucket, you must purchase R2 in the Cloudflare dashboard. To purchase R2: Log in to the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link . In Account Home, select R2. Select Purchase R2 Plan. Select Proceed to Payment Details to review your payment.
